official_title: A joint resolution disapproving the 1988 certification by the President with respect to Laos under section 481(h) of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961.

summary.text: Disapproves the President's certification for U.S. assistance to Laos under provisions of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 relating to countries that fail to take adequate measures to prevent narcotic drugs and other controlled substances from being sold illegally within the jurisdiction of such country to U.S. Government personnel or from entering the United States unlawfully.

titles.title: A joint resolution disapproving the 1988 certification by the President with respect to Laos under section 481(h) of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961.
